children.subject: Not sure about EECS126 or CS186, but in my experience CS188 has not taken a ton of time

I took 126 and 188 in different semesters. 126 is extremely time consuming. I personally feel like it’s the hardest class I have ever taken here at Berkeley(well it has to do with the fact that I am really lousy at probability tho). 188 is not that time consuming. The exams are hard, but the homework is more like something that help you get familiar with the material, not something that’s more challenging than exam questions like in the 126’s case. Haven’t take 186 so can’t help with that sry.

186 midterms are tough, projects can take a little or a lot of time, because debugging is really difficult(you're working with files that have multiple methods and classes already there), and the material is dense and tricky at times.

We've had 3 projects so far. SQL took me about 5-10 hours, 1 afternoon and a morning. The 2nd project took me 10-20 hours, 1 afternoon, 1 full day, and 1 morning. It took longer because of debugging and not understanding how the built in methods and classes would help in completing the project. Project 3 took me 30+ hours because of debugging(I couldn't find my bugs), and the concepts were difficult to implement in code(Used all 3 slip days). There was very little instructions on what to do, and staff has mentioned they will change this for future iterations of the course. Apparently HW 4 is easy, and HW5 is the 2nd most difficult, although I haven't done them yet.

This is not a class you should take as a 3rd tech, and if I just took 61c and 186, i'd still be extremely busy.

I don't know your situation, so it's hard to give an absolute recommendation. I would strongly suggest avoiding these 3 techs together, but if this is required so you aren't overwhelmed a future semester, or you need to take these courses to take other desired courses, you'll survive if you work hard most days and go to office hours.

EECS 126 and CS 188 will be a better solution. It still won't be easy, but you'll be a lot less overwhelmed with work.

history.content: About how hard would this schedule be for next semester? Would it be advisable to swap CS186 for something like Data 100?
history.subject: EECS126 + CS188 + CS186?
